prompt:
Create a modern, friendly hero illustration for a family tech literacy workshop landing page. Match Option A composition/style: clean vector + soft gradients, premium startup aesthetic, deep navy background with subtle sky-blue glow, lots of negative space.

Scene:
- Dad and daughter (girl age 4–10) sitting at a table together.
- NO computer, NO tablet, NO phone, NO screens.
- On the table: paper, puzzle pieces, a toy robot, a magnifying glass.
- Subtle abstract UI shapes (buttons, sliders) floating gently in the background.

Characters:
- Both characters have a LIGHT skin tone (same tone for both), friendly and natural.

Text:
- Include only the headline text: “Family Tech Literacy Workshop” (no other text).
